name: Hope (2020) - By David W. J. Lloyd
description: Edition of 10. Size 2049px x 3000px. Format: Jpeg. Originally a mixed media drawing made on paper with pencils, inks, gel inks and whiteout. Only 10 of these will be made available as NFTs. When all hope is fled, there is always hope...  Copyright 2020 - David W. J. Lloyd
